A message of thanks for helping with MR on the tvtropes website
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2008 Topics: (Year We Visited the Town): A message of thanks for helping with MR on the tvtropes website
By alphamone on Sunday, May 25, 2008 - 02:17 pm:

I would just like to post a message of thanks to the memeber who did all of that great work on the monster rancher page of the TV tropes website. I am assuming it was someone from here as this is pretty much the major english monster rancher community, and there were referances to things that definatly show that it wasnt just a casual player that wrote it. Wether said person is still a regular visitor, I do not know, but in case they are, this message is for you.

Also, I think there was a page on it before their hard drive crash a while back, but it was lost in the crash. I myself recreated the actual page with the description, and added a few referances on other pages, but I doubted my skill in making things sound funny to write for the actual page.

So, basicly, thankyou kind person who helped with the page.
